Package("Hemi.storage");
Hemi Hemi A bridge for implementing DOM Storage or Storage facades.
storage 3.5.1 A wrapper for cross browser storage support.
Get Item Retrieves an item from storage [string] = getItem(key); var provider = HemiEngine.storage.StorageManager.getStorageProvider(); if(provider) var sValue = provider.getItem("some key");
Set Item Saves an item into storage [bool] = setItem(key, val); var provider = HemiEngine.storage.StorageManager.getStorageProvider(); if(provider) var bReturn = provider.setItem("some key","some value");
2011/05/03 IE 9 is balking at the check for the Storage object in some conditions, potentially due to corporate proxy/firewall settings

getStorageProvider Returns a storage provider. Returns a reference to a storage provider.
testStorageReadWrite A StorageProvider to test. Returns the specified provider if it passes the test, otherwise, returns undefined. Fixed test to assert the specified API is functioning.
testStorageSupported Bit indicating storage API support. Returns a bit indicating whether the storage API is supported.
StorageProvider 3.5.1 A storage provider.
storage_type Type name of the storage provider (eg: DOMStorage, IEStorage, DBStorage).
